==History==
Prior to [[0.8]], [[Arcane Marksmen]] would begin the game with this [[spellbook]]. Both were removed in 0.8, though Arcane Marksmen were reintroduced in [[0.10]] with the [[Book of Debilitation]] instead.

[[Category:Obsolete]]
